photo.alt: Day1: Sept 29th = Jemma Bolland, Blame, Shame and Panic - What not do to when things go wrong, Domenico Musto - Development productivity in a post serverless world, Divya Mohan - The curious case of the DevOps Engineer and other things we've gotten wrong about DevOps, Kief Morris - Scaling Infrastructure as Code. Day 2 - Sept 30th = Matty Stratton - The journey from DevOps to Cloud Engineering, Floor Drees - SOS: Sustainable Open Source, Oliver Leaver-Smith, Paid to sleep, Billie Thompson - The next level pipelines delivering Net Zero
